nodes.text: The Battle of Nal Kapok took place on the planet Nal Kapok during the Clone Wars between the Confederacy of Independent Systems and the Galactic Republic. R0-GR, a B1-series battle droid veteran of the Clone Wars, considered this battle the worst battle he fought in.
This battle was first mentioned in LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures but was later canonized by Star Wars: Droidography.
